text:
Hi guys,

Is there any way of bulk changing the Blog Template for all the Blog Posts at once?
Settings > Website > Blog > Templates tab, this is where you change the template for blog posts
<@U25PYL3Q8> I know about that, however, all my posts have different templates assigned in their Post settings, I'm referring to that
Where is this setting at, can you provide a screenshot?
In the Blog post itself in the settings tab
the same tab you get in the Pags and Landing PAges where you put in SEO info, url infor and a bunch of other stuff

I didn’t know you could do that… This is probably something you have to do manually.. I don’t know if there is an option in the blog api for this. Might be worth asking in the api channel <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C2YHAHB6K>

Hello everybody, someone can help me with images in template?
I’m working in a template and i can’t upload `webp` images to template folder =/ Has some issue about this?

VScode x Template files un HubSpot

Checking, but I’m pretty sure we don’t support uploading webp in the developer file system. It’s also not recommended you upload webp to HubSpot anyways because we actually progressively enhance pngs/jpgs to webp automatically.
